title: Realizing
description: This young adult novel shares the coming out story of Nathan Sherver. Nathan grows up in a small town in west central Minnesota. Nathan knows there is something a bit different about himself from his friends in Bentwood, but being gay is not an option. Follow Nathan as he navigates through his relationships and unique experiences in junior high and high school and then arrives at college where he hopes he can finally allow himself to be who he is to be.
author: Casey Lankow
